alert.note: Alert for Emmet; Kossuth; Palo Alto (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:02PM CDT until July 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR EASTERN EMMET...NORTHERN KOSSUTH AND NORTHEASTERN PALO ALTO COUNTIES... At 700 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ledyard, or 22 miles southeast of Fairmont, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Iowa Lake, Union Slogh, Okamanpedan Lake, Armstrong, Bancroft, Swea City, Titonka, Ringsted, Fenton, Lakota, Lone Rock, Ledyard and Okamanpedan State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
